At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I take off and turn slightly to the left, then fly towards the building.  
B. I go to the white line mark on the road.  
C. I stand tall and head toward the building until I see the steps of the brown building.  
D. I turn around and head toward the building until I see the brown-red building.  
E. I go directly above the road.
